NAME.Nominative: Friday of the Fourth Week of Lent
NAME.Short: Friday of the Fourth Week of Lent

TROPARION.Header:
Troparion of the Prophecy in the 1st Tone
(Troparion of the Cross)

SEXTE.TROPARION: O Lord, save Your people and bless Your inheritance; grant victory to the faithful over their adversary, and by the power of your Cross guard your habitation.

PROKEIMENON.Header: First Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 6<sup>th</sup> Tone

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: But He is compassionate and will be gracious unto their sins.
But He is compassionate and will be gracious unto their sins.
SEXTE.STICHOS: Give heed, O my people, to my law.

PROKEIMENON.Header: Second Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 5<sup>th</sup> Tone

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: Help us, O God our Saviour.
I will chant unto the God of Jacob.
SEXTE.STICHOS: O God, the heathen are come into Thine inheritance.
